title: Manage Scouting Assignments
description: The head of scouting needs to assign scouts to watch specific amateur tournaments.

tasks.description: Retrieve the schedule for upcoming amateur tournaments.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has a list of all relevant tournaments.

tasks.description: Get the availability of all team scouts.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the schedule for each scout.

tasks.description: Assign scouts to tournaments based on their expertise and location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates an assignment list, sending each scout to a specific tournament.
